content: MP-A I-GF Pipe shoe inlay (Glass fiber) Glass fiber insulating band for adding galvanic separation to MP-PS pipe shoes ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Modular support accessories > Modular support system accessories- - - ### FEATURES:Features Galvanic separation – prevents direct contact between pipe clamp and pipe (helping to avoid acoustic bridging) Adaptable – suitable for all MP-PS pipe shoes due to the clamping range of the pipe clamps (no specific clamp diameter required) Applications Creating temperature separation between pipes and pipe clamps to reduce temperature transfer to sub-structure Creating surface separation between pipes and pipe clamps to prevent direct contact between different materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fire resistance ( Yes/No): No Temperature resistance: -4 - 932 °F Material composition: Texturized E-Glass fiber, Self-adhesive layer Technical Data | Fire resistance ( Yes/No) | No | Temperature resistance | -4 - 932 °F | Material composition | Texturized E-Glass fiber, Self-adhesive layer | Surface finish | n/a | Hot-dip galvanized | No | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Base material type | n/a ### ITEMS- 2331068 - Glass fiber insulating band for 21mm-51mm diameter - Package Size 1 pc - 2331069 - Glass fiber insulating band for 52mm-173mm diameter - Package Size 1 pc - 2331070 - Glass fiber insulating band for 192mm-328mm diameter - Package Size 1 pc - 2331071 - Glass fiber insulating band for 350mm-615mm diameter - Package Size 1 pc
